page.title: 05Riding at Winteringham Farm
page.content: { Winteringham Farm Riding Centre}is near{Thorpe in Balne}and is owned by {Mrs. Boulton}and her married daughter {Mrs. Rees.}It is open for adults and children.The prices are{Â£4}an hour for an adult,{Â£3}an hour and{Â£2}half an hour for children.The address is: {Mrs. Boulton, { Winteringham Farm Riding Centre, {Thorpe in Balne, { Nr.Doncaster. {Telephone:0302 882290 If you have nowhere to keep your horse you can keep it at{Winteringham {Farm Riding Centre}and they will look after it. { Mrs.Rees}breaks in horses and also she teaches you to ride if you are a beginner.
